channel.title: Help Us Help You!
channel.description:
So, as some of you may have noticed, your 'prayers of the report to mod. button' have been answered.
I suggest you guys use it more often to control the spam, flaming, and any other attempts to not follow the rules. Some of you who have used the button have gotten people temporarily banned, even.
So, like I say, if the post is bad, the user breaks rules, or anything else, report it!

item.title: Help Us Help You!
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Algas:

But reporting is not a weapon to use against other users. I read someone posting “Post in to my topic again and I will report you”. Just simply reporting spam, flame and such will help us to do our job.

To take it even farther, if you abuse the report user button action will be taken against you, it tells us who sent it and who it was against.

Read full topic
